metadata.title: CVE-2022-48339 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNU Emacs through 28.2. htmlfontify.el has acommand injection vulnerability. In the hfy-istext-command function, theparameter file and parameter srcdir come from external input, andparameters are not escaped. If a file name or directory name contains shellmetacharacters, code may be executed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48339` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-bin-common - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-common - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-el - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-gtk - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-lucid - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-nox - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
emacs-pgtk - 1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: emacs package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:28.2+1-12ubuntu1').
